LanguageData.AntigrainDeadManSwitch_Item.label: Antigrain dead mans switch
LanguageData.AntigrainDeadManSwitch_Item.description: Install this in a pawn. When that pawn dies, anyone else within a large radius also dies.
LanguageData.EMPDeadManSwitch_Item.label: EMP dead mans switch
LanguageData.EMPDeadManSwitch_Item.description: Install this in a pawn. When that pawn dies, all electronics nearby will be shut down. Useful for disabling turrets.
LanguageData.FirefoamDeadManSwitch_Item.label: Firefoam dead mans switch
LanguageData.FirefoamDeadManSwitch_Item.description: Install this in a pawn. When that pawn dies, firefoam will burst from their body, smothering any nearby fires.
LanguageData.HighExplosiveDeadManSwitch_Item.label: High explosive dead mans switch
LanguageData.HighExplosiveDeadManSwitch_Item.descript: Install this in a pawn. When that pawn dies, big boom boom go boom.
LanguageData.IncendiaryDeadManSwitch_Item.label: Incendiary dead mans switch
LanguageData.IncendiaryDeadManSwitch_Item.description: Install this in a pawn. When that pawn dies, explodes like a molotov cocktail.
